---
title: "webgestaltr"
output: html_document
---

```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(WebGestaltR)
```

```{r}

genes <- c("TP53", "BRCA1", "EGFR", "MYC", "PTEN")

WebGestaltR(
  organism = "hsapiens",
  enrichMethod = "ORA",
  enrichDatabase = c("pathway_KEGG", "pathway_Reactome", "geneontology_Biological_Process"),
  interestGene = genes,
  interestGeneType = "genesymbol",
  referenceSet = "genome_protein-coding",
  isOutput = TRUE,
  outputDirectory = "."
)

```
